justification: Misreads Team B’s needs: B already has a Tier 1 TE (no ‘huge TE void’) and values stable floors, making an injured, high-variance WR (Derek Harris) unattractive while needing wins now. Trading away a healthy, low-volatility RB (Ben King) hurts B’s floor and RB depth. Rationale labels Harris as ‘stable,’ contradicting archetype and injury. Minimal, generic reasoning and inflated accept probability.
